page.title: 15An Ordinary Day (Cont.)
page.content:
education. Two mornings a week I attend a local aerobics class where I work out for about an hour. Sue,the instructress is very good and makes all the class check their pulse both before and after the exercises just to make sure we don't overdo it it's always a temptation to try and keep up with the class even when your body's telling you that it has had enough. One girl last week put her back out quite badly but we managed to get her flat on the floor, and we pulled alternate arms and legs to straighten her out before taking her to the ostoepath for more professional treatment.
I also belong to the local netball club where I play one or two evenings a week in the summer and on Saturdays in the winter. We are a fun club, our
